summary: In Shivering Isles, Dervenin was the High Priest of Mana; this mod changes his clothing to reflect that.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Mage/Priest Dervenin.

This is my first released mod, but I only used Skyrim and the official Update to make it, so there should be no conflict. Â I [i]did not [/i]change the dirt on his face because I'm still not confident on that regard yet, but I think he now befits his former station, even if he still is a "beggar."

Please use and enjoy freely.

Enjoy!
author: Rini1031
